summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and amending Plat 70W, page 167, of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle (Ordinance 86300), to rezone a portion of the North 1/2 of Section 30, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W.M. from RS 7200 to IG, contingent upon the execution of a Property Use and Development Agreement (Petition of Waterway Land Corporation, C.F. 276214).
